✔ DESIGNED IN CALIFORNIA - Slimmer footprint lets this XXL Air fryer fit on your countertop and save space. Replace multiple appliances with this sleek, compact and portable cooking appliance. Every kitchen deserves an Air Fryer. Product Dimension: 13x14.2x16". The XXL 5.8Qt air fryer serves food for up to 7 people.

✔ THE FULL AIR FRYER PACKAGE - Compared to other brands, this XXL Simple Living Air fryer has a larger & more usable square basket space that holds more food than round design baskets. Additionally, we offer a 3-piece accessory set valued at $29.99 for FREE. All accessories and cooking baskets have nonstick coating and are dishwasher safe. ORIGINAL RECIPE COOKBOOK - Enjoy your favorite fried foods with our selection of delicious & easy recipes for every meal.

✔EFFORTLESS HEALTHIER COOKING - No need for oil. Delivers 80% less fat than traditional deep-frying methods but delivers the same deliciously crunchy taste of fried food with little to no oil. Reduces the smell of oil and cooking in your home, making it a healthier choice all round for you and your family. COOK FASTER - Cooking time using this air fryer is faster than any conventional oven, but with crispier and tastier results.

✔ EASY TO COOK - Built in digital one-touch digital screen featuring 8 presets. Plus, a temperature range of 170°F - 400°F & a 60-minute timer. Choose to air fry Steak, Poultry, Seafood, Bacon, Frozen Foods, Pizza, French Fries, Vegetables, Cake, Bread, Desserts and More. Just tap and go! Super easy to use! The automatic shut off function prevents overcooking and perfectly cooked results.

✔1-YEAR WARRANTY – Plus Lifetime Support from Simple Living Products. Just contact Simple Living Products Customer Service team who are based in Southern California. Yes, you will get speaking to a real person. ETL Certified, FDA & PFOA Approved. Plus 100% User Satisfaction Guaranteed.

productDescription: What is Air Frying and What does an Air Fryer do? The Simple Living Products cutting edge Air Fryer can cook foods just like a deep fryer but without the added oil. Our Air Fryer uses a Dynamic Airflow Technology, this means that this appliance rapidly surrounds your food with Turbo Cyclonic Air instead of oil. Therefore, your meals are delivered using a much healthier version of cooking. For example, your foods are cooked in a whirlwind of super-heated air, not oil. The result is still great crispy fried texture & taste.

Delivers 80% Less Calories in ALL Your Meals. Air Frying will change the world you cook in. All your favorite fast foods can be made with fewer calories from added cooking oil and grease, without sacrificing taste. This counter-top cooking appliance ensures the same, crispy fried taste & texture you love but with NO oil, NO trans fats and NO Greasy mess! It really is that simple. This must have kitchen gadget is healthy, fun and fast.

Load it! Set it! Enjoy it! Compared with traditional cooking or deep frying, this air fryer creates no smoke or smells providing your family with a home environment and a healthier lifestyle. This Air Fryer allows you to cook like a chef in your own home while also reducing your calories by 80%, allowing you to eat more low-fat meals and helping you to remove oil out of your diet completely.

The Full "Air Fryer" Experience. Included with the Air Fryer is a 3 piece must have accessory set. These really are the 3 Most Used Air Fryer Accessories, plus they have a 3 layer non-stick Teflon coating. They allow you to cook more in your air fryer for any meal including breakfast, lunch, dinner or desert.
Specifications

A large LCD digital display shows the 8 cooking functions and optional settings on a convenient and easy to use screen. Choose between any of the presets or set your own custom time and temperature. With a 60 minute timer and a wide temperature range of 180-400°F you have so much choice.
You make the selection, and the machine takes care of the calculations. The LED panel helps you make excellent choices - no matter what food you decide to make.

Once the cooking mode is selected the Air Fryer Instantly Heats ensuring no "heat up" is necessary. Once you start the cooking process, let the air fryer work on its own – no need to monitor it or adjust the heat while its doing its magic.
This heat preservation function ensures zero food spoilage. There's no need to worry that the food will be cold if your friends or family are late.
This XL advanced Air fryer has a 120-minute (2 Hours) heat preservation function that allows you to enjoy hot delicious food at any time.
Customers love this feature as it allows them loads of time to cook other items.

Air Frying combines precise circulation, hot air, optimal temperature balancing, and a grilling element to fry delicious foods faster but without ANY OIL. It extracts fats & juices from the food. It then "airfrys" the food by coating it with the extracted fats & juices and making the food airborne.
The final result is Tender on the Inside and Crispy on the Outside...!
When the timer is done, the air fryer automatically shuts off and stops the cooking cycle so you never overcook or burn your meal. This is also a great safety feature that many air fryers don't have.
Additionally if you remove the pan from the Air Fryer, but decide to put it back in, the airfryer remembers the cooking function and automatically starts up again.

This counter top appliance allows you to prepare a full meal for the entire family in record time. You will be impressed by its speedy cooking performance. This cooking method makes cooking easy and fast, with most foods cooking within 30 minutes.
Boosting 80% less calories this air fryer circulates air within the Air fryer up to 400ºF, ensuring food is evenly cooked and crispy on the outside while preserving tenderness inside.

With a compact, portable a sleek design it has a 5.8QT capacity, yet its still a perfect size for counter tops. Whats more the extra large capacity of this air fryer ensures even more satisfied tummies at once.
With its loaded Teflon coating its easy to clean. Choose to hand wash it or place it in the dishwasher.The easy to clean drip tray catches excess fats, so you don't need to worry about splatters.

reviews.reviewText:
I loved this air fryer, it is huge! The timer would not shut off and I had so many problems getting the drawer shut to make it cook. I am returning this one and ordering the same one again. Hopefully it is just this one that was faulty. We shall see, the other one will be here Wednesday!
It is Wednesday and I received my new air fryer - customer service is fantastic, they walked me through how to put the basket in and this timer works. I am truly amazed at customer service at Simple Living Products it doesn't happen anymore in this world that someone stands behind their product. Thank you Michelle for taking care of me. I will pick a Simple Living Product over any product next time I buy something simply because they take care of the customer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ease of use and ability to cook bigger portion
reviews.reviewText: This is our third air fryer. The first was a smaller 3l size. We loved using it instead of trying but found the size inadequate for cooking for more than one to two people (depending on the food type). So we gave it to our son to use at college and ordered a larger sized one. The second one opened on the top and was monstrous in size. The top opening would hit the underneath of our cabinet when opened so we had to use the fryer in a place where there was no cabinets. Though it came with all kinds of gadgets, It was must too big and awkward. So I searched for one that was a larger version of the first and found this one on Amazon. It barely takes up anymore space than the first one but works the same way with the opening a pull out handle on the front. The basket is a little heavier to hold, bot if you want an air fryer that can cook food for at least three to four people in one batch and is simple to use, this will serve your needs well

I really liked my air fryer, until I cooked some pork chops in it today. The basket has had one little spot where it looked like the coating might have come off. I have only hand washed the basket, and I’ve been very careful with it. I turned over the pork chops that I was cooking, and all of them have black coating all over them. You can clearly see it in the photo. I couldn’t find anyway to contact the company. This air fryer ended up being a huge waste of money. Very disappointed.

I've been enjoying my air fryer for a little over a month and use it 3-4 times a week. I've cooked whole chickens, chicken strips, boneless pork ribs, donuts, lots of french fries and more and everything has come out great. If given a choice I would have rated it 4 1/2 stars, but since that wasn't an option I had to go with 4 stars. The big issue I have that resulted in the loss of the star is the fact that the basket has already started losing some of it's non-stick quality. I have NOT cleaned it with anything abrasive and looking at it you cannot see any difference. However, the first couple of weeks, cleaning it didn't take any hard rubbing and any residue simply wiped off. Now it takes a lot of muscle to get stuff off of the basket. Yes, I do spray the basket with oil before cooking so food doesn't stick. I've had to resort to using parchment paper for most of my air fryer. This helps some, but because there are holes in the parchment paper (to match the holes in the basket) the juices/sauces still get on the basket and are hard to remove. Other than that I think this is an excellent product.

reviews.reviewTitle: The only kitchen appliance I have used since I purchased it.
reviews.reviewText:
I purchased this air fryer a couple weeks ago and love it. For the past 2 weeks it has been the only kitchen appliance we have used. I love that the kitchen doesn't get heated up and it's simple to use. I have already made chicken wings that took 24 minutes, quesadillas took 10 minutes , Reuben egg rolls took 8 minutes, pizza logs, grilled ham & cheese sandwiches and even apple hand pies. I could go on and on. Makes healthy food in a matter of minutes and leaves no grease smell in your house. The food comes out crispy with less calories than deep frying. The recipe book has some great recipes in it and am looking forward to trying them. I'm excited that it can even make a cake.

It only needs to preheat for about 3-4 minutes and the basket is dishwasher safe. Makes for easy cleanup. I like that it's big enough for the entire family and also comes with a divider so I can make 2 things at once. The drawer slides in and out easily and you just press the button and the basket releases to place both parts in the dishwasher.

I highly recommend this Air Fryer to anyone looking for one. If I knew how easy it was to use, I would have bought it a lot sooner.

WE LOVE THIS APPLIANCE!! Easy to use, big basket, easy to clean! I did a lot of research before deciding to purchase from this company and I'm glad I did. I emailed a week ago or so with a question and I got an immediate response, followed up by a personal phone call. Let me ask you - Have you EVER gotten this kind of customer service from an online retailer with Amazon? Will 100% purchase from Simple Living Products again.
THANKS MICHELLE & CREW!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very satisfied with the air fryer
reviews.reviewText: Very satisfied with the air fryer. we've used it a bunch of times already in two weeks. Originally we ordered the air fryer and received one that didn't work. I contacted Amazon and they told me to send it back. Simple Living Products then reached out to me to find out what the issue was. Michelle is the rep that I talked to and she was very helpful. She was very apologetic and assured me that this was a rare occurrence and that she wanted to make sure that I was taken care of for my trouble. Michelle offered me a free upgrade to the digital model and explained that I would have to wait for a little longer because the model wasn't out yet. I accepted, and the she even checked back with me later to let me know the fryer would soon be arriving. She was very helpful and turned a little bit of a crappy situation into a great one. We love the air fryer!!!

I have absolutely no dislikes with regard to this air fryer. Oh my gosh, the clean-up is beyond a breeze. Take the time to season your air fryer as stated in the booklet that comes with it and this gem will never let you down. It takes no time at all to do so and you will appreciate the fact that you did so. I had and still have my other air fryer (no brand mention here) that never mentioned seasoning and I would rate that machine poorly compared to this. The old is boxed up. Done with it. This wonderful machine is very easy to use. I had no learning curve with this as I had a prior machine. I could not be happier with my purchase (Prime Day) and tell others about this. I had my doubts because it was an unfamiliar name and I am telling you, my gamble sure shocked me the first time I used it and continues to do so. If you are on the fence on this one - do yourself a favor and grab it. You will most definitely not be disappointed in the least. Oh and it is a big one!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Cooks great but open your windows and use your fans because it does "smoke" if you use any oil.
reviews.reviewText: I have had my fryer for a little over a week. I have cooked pork chops, chicken thighs, rib eye steak, fries, and a whole chicken. It does what it says and it's fast too! I will say only use the cook times that it gives you as a "guide" and eyeball what you're cooking (check it halfway) in order to perfect the times. The only things that I don't like is there is no preheat setting and the basket has to be pushed in order to heat up the device. You then have to pull out a hot basket to put your food it. Doable but tedious. Also I use a drizzle of oil for "crispness" and it causes smoke to the point that you think something is burning and it isn't. I suggest using a air cleaner or opening a window and using your fans if that happens. Other than that it has worked great.

reviews.reviewTitle: HIGHLY RECOMMEND THE PURCHASE OF THIS FRYER!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE THIS FRYER! it does exactly what it says. I don't hardly even use my stove or oven anymore. I keep trying to find things for this fryer which actually does a lot more than just frying. This is one of the best and most handiful kitchen appliance I have ever bought its price way outreaches its performance, worth much more. IT IS HUGE, NOT TO BIG TO FIT THE COUNTER BUT THIS IS NOT A SMALL FRYER. I have used all kinds including the typical oil fryer which I actually replaced with this. I work a lot so sometimes I have to put FROZEN big chicken in it and in 20 min. it is perfectly done. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO ANYONE WHO IS LOOKING TO REPLACE THEIR FRYER!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Air Fryer stopped working in just 2 months.
reviews.reviewText:
I brought this Air Fryer through Amazon in January. I liked the size and the health benefits. We used it a 2-3 times a week. Yesterday, it stopped working. It wont turn on any more.
Called customer service. They asked me to send pictures and video of the unit, so that they can trouble shoot. Will wait and see how they respond back to this non-functional unit. It is just 2 months, luckily it is under warranty for a year. But not happy that a product [I paid $179] that expensive, will stop working in 2 months.

Update** April 20th,2018 Thanks to Simple Living Product's excellent customer service. I received my new replacement unit yesterday.
Gave me peace of mind that I am dealing with a company that stands by its product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Used daily for about a month now
reviews.reviewText:
Love it! I've used it daily during the month or so I've had it. Easy to clean. No problems inserting and removing the tray (which I heard some people have issues with that on air fryers, so I was pleasantly surprised). Love that you don't really have to preheat it (maybe you're supposed to, but I haven't done it and I've had no issues). I'm guessing it will eventually pay for itself by reducing the amount that I eat out. Wish there was a better guide on times, but I haven't burnt anything yet. Biggest downside is that does seem to work a lot better if stuff is in a single layer rather than piled up, which is no problem if not making food for more than 2 people. Makes me super glad I got the 5+ qt. instead of a 3 qt.

I have not mastered homemade breading yet (flour turns out powdery) but anything premade has turned out amazing (chicken nugs, tater tots, onion rings, pizza rolls, frozen fish, shrimp, clams). Works really well on asparagus. I was even able to reheat leftover battered shrimp in it, and it was crispy second time around so that's really nice being able to save stuff I probably normally would have thrown away.

After reading the reviews about some problems with the nonstick surface flaking off, I was careful to follow directions exactly for seasoning the fryer when it arrived. Unfortunately however, after just 3 uses (with nonstick utensils) there was a small area on the basket insert surface that had lost the nonstick coating. I contacted customer service, sending a photo of the area damaged and the response was prompt and excellent. They shipped a new basket as soon as it was available, and all is well.
We love the fryer. It is quieter than others we've tried, and the basket slides in and out perfectly. With another brand we had borrowed to try, we had to wrestle the basket in each time. The digital controls are easy to use and easy to see. Having the accessories come with the fryer is great too. We use the rack and pans often, and it is a real savings to not have had to buy them separately. Temperature and time settings seem to be accurate, and we're cooking up some pretty good food in it!
Hopefully the issue with the coating will be solved, but we found Simple Living's customer service team to be absolutely the best, and our issue resolved fully to our satisfaction.

While I love what this air fryer can do, the quality is awful. To get the unit to work, the basket must be inserted just right. We often have to re-insert the basket over 10 times to get to working while flipping food. We often have to jam the basket in to latch it. It was a waste of money for this.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is AMAZING. We tried every recipe in the book and ...
reviews.reviewText: I purchased my unit for my family Christmas 2017. After reading many reviews on different units I settled on this particular one. I looked at price versus feedback on may units out there. I didn’t want to invest into a cheap or overly expensive unit and have it sway my opinion on air fryers. My colleagues at work and I had discussed the new fad of air fryers and though that that’s just what it was. Let me tell you when my unit arrived we set it up and began using it. It is AMAZING. We tried every recipe in the book and started experimenting from there. The Pizza in the book is highly recommended by my kids, they love it. Steak, Fires, and Chicken work perfectly. The fryer started out as another novelty machine that you have to find a place to hide when not in use to a staple in my kitchen. Perfect for all family members. This fryer gets more use than the built in microwave. The customer service that the company provides for their product is amazing. It’s as if you are talking to someone next door. We had a heating issue with our fryer and I contacted the company, within days my new unit was at my house without skipping a beat. They didn’t try and sell me something else or turn a cold shoulder, they were more concerned with my happiness. On a side not I was the Guinea pig for all of my colleagues, they all now own the same unit and have similar feedback as I do. (Seasoned steak tips in this thing are OMG)

Just received my Simple Living XXL 5.8 QT Digital Air Fryer, and so far I am extremely pleased. This 5.8 qt. is my 2nd air fryer; Avalon Bay 3.7 qt. was my first. Ordered this one for 2 reasons: wanted a larger size to easily accommodate whole chickens and because the non-stick coating has been wearing off the interior of my Avalon Bay and the accessory pans.

Regarding size, you can see the difference between the Avalon Bay 3.7 qt. and the Simple Living 5.8 in the attached photo.

As for the non-stick coating, the 2 are completely different types of coatings: Avalon Bay coating looks like it was sprayed on; Simple Living looks like the coating is actually in the pan (metal). I will say the mfg. urges new owners to 'season' the interior of the pan (by heating with a coating of coconut oil) and baskets before using. I did; heartily recommend doing it. (see attached image for how to season fryer)

An important note-mine came without a user's guide (although it did have the recipe book). Apparently, some of these air fryers were part of a Holiday 'buy' between Amazon and Simple Living; one or other was supposed to add in a user's guide. If you DID NOT RECEIVE the guide, it is very confusing to figure out how to turn on the different presets for all the icons. The answer is the OUTER SILVER RING on the dial sets the temp, timer AND all presets, but until you start turning it most aren't visible. (see attached)

So far I have only tested this air fryer on a few meals; will say it seems to do a better job cooking food than the Avalon Bay. 'Fried' food was crispier that with the AB; food was juicier; cook time seemed less.

So far I am delighted with this purchase!

I really enjoyed air frying but unfortunately this item lasted less than 4 months before it broke. Almost immediately the paint inside was coming off. I used this item maybe 10-12 times before it stopped working completely. It’s unfortunate but I will be replacing this with another brand.

I have been very happy with my new hot air fryer, it's a healthy convenient way to cook. I have it now for about a month and cook/fry/roast just about all my meals from steaks, whole chicken, pork chops, and roasted veggies. Since I live in Florida, it also has been a convenience not having to turn on the oven and heat up the house. The 5.8 qt is a perfect size to roast a 6 lb chicken, the skin comes out crispy and the inside is tender and moist. I had purchased a hot air fryer cookbook, however, that wasn't really necessary, since I Google how to make certain foods/recipes and am creating my own personal hot air fryer cookbook. Cleaning it is easy, I just let the fry drawer/pan and basket soak over night in sudsy water. Only have one regret, that I hadn't purchased my hot air fryer sooner. Happy air frying!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy To Use and Customer Service is outstanding
reviews.reviewText: Had a issue with the basket yesterday when this arrived, contacted Customer service and wow they responded with a phone call. Sending me out a new basket as the button on this does not work properly. Great customer service !! So hubby kinda got it working enough to try air frying, made tater tots that were downright awesome, crisp and best flavor ever.Then did frozen fish patties and wow, crisp and not soggy at all, This morning writing this review eating cinnamon rolls the frozen kind I am totally hooked, Very happy with this air fryer and again Great Customer Service !!! Tonight fried chicken. I like the digital display and being able to open and ck food, clean up is so easy and for me that is a huge plus.

reviews.reviewTitle: Totally satisfied! Throw the book away!
reviews.reviewText: So far my air fryer has been nice to us. Tator tots are hard to cook as they stick together. And the book timing is waaaay off! My pork chops came out way tough. But the chicken was delicious! ( did not use the book on that one!!) it’s a hit and miss but the air fryer it’s self it’s great!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Holy Cow! This Machine is Great!
reviews.reviewText:
Wow! This Air Fryer is amazing. It saves me a lot of time.
PROS: The pot is easy to program. You can adjust the temperature and time while it is cooking. The machine is powerful and makes food crispy. This is a low fat method of cooking as long as you don't drench your food in oil. Just a tad will do. It comes with a booklet of recipes and list of food and cooking times which I copied and taped to the inside of my cabinet for quick reference. Easy to clean. Easy to program. Bright light display that counts down and indicates cooking temperature. Three beeps to notify end of cooking cycle. Turns off automatically.
CONS: The only drawback is that the fryer does not have an alarm to indicate when the food is half cooked (you have to turn over the food half way through the cooking process). I set a different alarm to notify me when to turn over the food.
NOTES: Season the tray: 400 degrees for 3 minutes-spray oil and cook for another 2 minutes. Fryer remains non-stick. I rinse/wash the trays right away to avoid food caking on. I use a soft bristle brush to get in the nook and crannies.
SIZE: FITS: Eight chunky chicken legs across or 4 big salmon steaks (across) or 2 lb bag of french fries (depth)
If you need a quick way to cook, this is it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Company is terrible to deal with.
reviews.reviewText: Product worked great...until there was a flaw. Parts of the plastic tray/pan would melt or break off and fall into the food. When I contacted the company, they said they’d never seen it before and that I could purchase a replacement. They weren’t willing to budge at all and basically accused me of breaking their item. I’m sure there are more reputable brands out there. Bottom line: I WOULD NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT OR ANYTHING FROM THE MANUFACTURER.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love this Air Fryer & Great Customer Support.
reviews.reviewText: I love this air fryer. Have to work on my timing a bit but everything I have tried from roasted veggies to frozen fries to reheating a Reuben sandwich has turned out great. It's BIG...takes up quite a bit of counter space. I live alone so probably should have gotten a smaller one. I did by the basket divider separately so am able to cook 2 foods at once to make use of the size. I had to call customer support for a problem with registering it and Michelle was amazing. All customer service people could learn from her!

I like the air fryer. It works great and is easy to use. But this morning I had 5 e-mails asking me to rate the product. If you don't mind getting numerous e-mails begging for reviews, this is a good air fryer.

reviews.reviewTitle: I am glad I did because
reviews.reviewText: Why I bought this air fryer. Many of the air fryers offer similar options and sizes. I narrowed my choices to 5, then I read the 1 star reviews of each of these. I chose the Simple Living 5.2L based on replies from the seller. I am glad I did because my basket had 2 small pin head scratches in it. I called to report the problem and was told they would replace the basket free of charge. The damage was determined to have happened during shipping. Having used it approx.10 times now, I love it and wouldn't trade it for anything. I have prepared fish, shrimp, chicken, steak, veggies and fries in it and all have turned out great. Buy an Olive oil spritzer if you want it real crispy. One thing that you need to be prepared for.....the handle will get warm. Mine hasn't been hot, but warm. It caught me off guard and I almost dropped the food, lol. It runs quiet, cooks well and is easy to clean. Customer service, Michelle, is 5 star.

I don't know how we lived without this thing. You can cook an astonishing number of foods in this and many of them do approach an actual deep fryer. Another plus is that you do not heat up the entire house doing it. This machine is large enough that we regularly cook an entire chicken in there that is better than any regular oven that I have ever roasted one in. I had a little glitch develop, but one email to their customer service contact and they were all over it with 100% total satisfaction.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cooks food fast and crispy! better than microwave or oven
reviews.reviewText: I love my air fryer! The price point for the size is the best part. We are a family of four, and it works well for us. We rarely even use our microwave anymore because of it. Ive cooked everything from frozen chicken wings, frozen raw chicken tenders, french fries, fish sticks, frozen french toast sticks (our FAVORITE!), sausage, bacon, etc. I've even been able to reheat leftover french fries and they taste just as yummy as the first time. Its much easier and quicker than preheating and firing up the oven. 4 stars only because the touch screen buttons can be a little tricky sometimes--not to hard, not too light, sometimes you have to find the "sweet spot" of the button--or I could just be spoiled to touch screen technology of smart phones/tablets.. either way, It wouldn't stop me from recommending it. We use ours atleast 3-4 times a week.

This thing is magic! I was always so afraid of air fryers because they seemed complicated! I was so wrong, this thing is turn key ready to fire up delicious meals within minutes! My go-to favorites are bacon, Wontons and mini pizza dough! The kiddo loves fish sticks! And my man loves tater tots and he has perfected his "fried" chicken strips and they are so good!

Being on a health lifestyle journey and being able to enjoy yummy, delicious foods with out added oil has been amazing!

There are so many helpful tools within the kit too. The manual with lists of times and temperatures is my favorite. I use the rack for bacon. I've made a mini pizza with one of the pans. And the deep dish is great for baking!

I have recommended this amazing magical item to all my friends and family! It's honestly life changing and I love how easy it is!

We had been looking for an air fryer for a few months. I was a little "put off" because I didn't recognize the brands being offered. But this one was the size and wattage we were looking for and the reviews were great so we took a chance. I cook "clean" so it's wonderful to have a tool to make healthy food taste amazing. I want to make everything in it. Cabbage, Brussels Sprouts, Potatoes, Chicken Legs, really any kind of veggie or lean meat is so much better in the air fryer. And on top of all of that, it's extremely user friendly and easy to clean. It was a great choice.

I am enjoying this product quite a bit. Since this is the first exposure to air fryer, part of me was skeptical, but it more than lived up to expectations.

I've made several batch of fries and wings, and it came out great. It's great knowing you can create good quality fried food without buying oil in bulk (expensive) and worrying about its proper disposal. It's also perfect for making open-faced melt sandwiches (tuna melt, roast beef melt, etc), since it's much faster than using an oven.

This appliance is also great for reheating food that otherwise will get soggy in the microwave..including all types of fried food, pizza and other bread-based leftovers.

The unit is big, enough space to cook 4~6 servings at a time, so it's perfect if you're feeding family or group of friends.

Lastly, I had questions to the seller, and the rep (Michelle) was quick to respond, friendly, and handled my inquiry very professionally.

I have a smaller air fryer that I love but always had to cram stuff in and contort, I needed a larger size. I looked to get the biggest one I could find of similar design (pull out bowl via handle). This more than fits the bill, I can put so much food in there and it's fun to figure out "what else can I put in there, a hand, a foot, door stopper, what?!" Sike. lol There is no other cooking appliance I want to use. Period. If it were any easier, it would be a robot taking my dinner orders and all the logistics... it's basically one level below that. Ha! I love it!

I purchased this air fryer a couple of months ago. I noticed shortly after that it started to rust even though I followed all usage instructions. I was hopeful that with the one year warranty that they supposedly have it would be replaced, however, that’s not the case. I contacted them and they had the nerve to send me a link to purchase the replacement basket and pan that had rusted because those parts only had a 90 day warranty. What a joke. If it rusted the first time I refuse to continue giving them my money. I have posted pictures for you to see. So unsafe!
Stopped working after a few times.

I WENT BACK AN FORTH ON WHETHER I NEEDED ANOTHER APPLIANCE THAT WOULD ONLY GET OCCASIONAL USE. SO GLAD I MADE THIS PURCHASE. IT IS A TOOL THAT IS USED IN MY KITCHEN SEVERAL TIMES A WEEK. THIS PARTICULAR MODEL IS SO EASY TO USE. IT IS SUBSTANTIAL IN CAPACITY SO THAT I CAN DO LARGER AMOUNTS OF FOODS LIKE FRIES OR CHICKEN. MY FAVORITE RECIPE...A PITA VEGGIE PIZZA. WONDERFUL AND DONE IN 8 MINUTES. WARMING FRIED CHICKEN GIVES US A MEAL JUST AS GOOD AS THE ORIGINAL, CRISP AND FLAVORFUL.

reviews.reviewTitle: Size is important for an air fryer. It needs air space to circulate the heat to cook
reviews.reviewText:
I like the air fry technology as a whole, and I bought this before I saw the air fryer oven and I though oh no I bought the wrong thing. However I also have a place to use 2 air fryers so o bought that as well, so I am in a good position to say is this one worth it.
When I first got it, we did fries, home made chicken nuggets, grilled sandwiches, and they were all great. However it was not put it in and come back when it’s done. Fries need tossing, sanwhiches need turning and nuggets need flippping, the ultimately the output was great, but I had to cook a bit (ie turn stuff). So then I got the oven with shelf’s that allow you to stack food, and long story short, I still had to flip sandwiches, turn nuggets, but the fries basket rotates so a bit less of that, but it is still not hands free, they get stuck and burnt if you don’t take them out and wiggle. So this product over the oven competitor is great. Fries I suggest smaller spud chunks because they rotate better when you toss them, the larger capacity is needed I think a smaller one would be too small for air circulation, and finally the important question in my mind is clean up.
This has a great basket that you put in and out of the cooker, you can undock the internal piece for easy cleaning and it has a bunch of other inserts which I have not used.
As for customer service I had a query and they were fantastic, so 5 starts for that.
So why only 4 stars, I think that is limited by technology, I would like to shove food in and take it out (I put fries or nuggets in oven and I still got to wiggle them), but if asked would I return this product, no I would not, of asked would be buy again, yes I would, if asked this over the infomercial oven, ummmm! I own both, this one is much much easier to get food in and out with its basket, you got to juggle fries with both this is easier but needs more often, but I don’t need to put an oven glove on to do that.
Absolutely amazing! Cooks very quickly and is crispy. Highly recommend going with the 5 liter

We have enjoyed this air fryer immensely. We have used it for everything from tater tots to chicken wings. The kids don’t notice the difference. The only issue we’ve had is that we have a huge microwave and if the microwave is run on the same breaker as the air fryer it will trip the breaker so as long as we move it to a socket on a different breaker or don’t turn on the microwave we’re good...that’s a house problem though....guess that part of the review was pointless.

reviews.reviewTitle: Clean Frying, Clean Eating, No Greasy Clean Up
reviews.reviewText: The flavor of all my foods have been better than ever. The air fryer is very easy to use. It takes me 8 minutes to fry bacon in the morning. I no longer have a 20 minute grease clean up to do after I cook. It is very simple to clean up the basket and pan. I can place a little over 20 chicken drummettes wings in this fryer at once.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Size and Easy To Use
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer has a bigger basket than I expected and it is easy to use and easy to clean. It does take up quite a bit of counter space but our old oil fryer took up a decent amount of room and this is much better looking and cleaner. I love that we don't have to worry about cleaning out a bunch of old oil or cleaning oil splatters. We cook fries, bacon, salmon in it most of the time. Breaded salmon is a little dry on the outside but still worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Season it first, didn’t think it would matter but WOW the food literally just slid right out!
reviews.reviewText:
I was so excited to open that box! (So was my granddaughter haha). Set Up was a breeze. All of the most important things to remember are listed multiple times in writing and pictures so there is no confusion! We made baked pototaes and steak in it last night...perfection!
.
Shipped super fast
.
Box was in good sbape, no damage
.
All the pieces were there (hallelujah)
.
Instructions were easy to read and follow
.
So simple to use!
.
Love the addition of the clumsy thumbs cover...no more accidentally separating the basket while it has hot food in it!
.
Highly recommend ❤️

reviews.reviewTitle: This air fryer changes the game on healthy alternatives!
reviews.reviewText:
I'm absolutely obsessed with this air fryer. After having it for only a few weeks it's become my most used kitchen appliance. My favorite thing about it is the size. It's small enough to fit comfortably on my countertop, underneath my cabinets but large enough to make 6 full sized pork chops at once (using the metal stand for the top 2 chops). I also love how versatile this air fryer is. I can reheat leftovers and they taste like they just came out of the kitchen. Ever try to reheat french fries in the microwave? Not a problem anymore! I also love to make frozen french fries in this because they taste restaurant quality, without all of the nasty oils.

I can also cook entire meals using just this one kitchen appliance. My favorite are pork chops, brussel sprouts, and squash. The digital readout is super easy to understand and makes the whole process incredibly simple. I highly recommend grabbing this air fryer because it's a home cook's dream!

I have had the digital cooker for about 3 weeks now. It is absolutely wonderful. My husband and I are loving all of the meals that we have cooked with it. The food turns out juicy and tender, not oily, and just absolutely delicious. Our daughter had purchased an air fryer earlier this year and she was singing the praises of it. We decided to try one for ourselves and we are so glad we did. It is definitely rated 5 stars and if we could give it more, we would. Thank you so much for such an outstanding product.

I have received a new digital fryer from the same company and it was like worlds apart from the manual one, I fell in love with the new digital fryer, the food comes out so much better and it's is really a nonstick fryer! I love it.

I love my air fryer so much. It's so easy to use and a very convenient way to cook without having to pay much attention to it. Food is crispy on the outside, and tender and juicy on the inside. Once it malfunctioned, and the company took care of me by sending a new unit for free. In the meantime, I had to go back to roasting my veggies in the oven and it just was not the same. I went into air fry withdrawal. The fryer has spoiled me! Cooking hasn't been the same since. All I have to do is load it, set the time and temp, push a button, wait for a beep and it is done (unless I am making fries or something that requires multiple stirs or shakes.) I can take a shower or otherwise occupy myself in the meantime. It makes life so much easier. And tastier, too! Thank you, Simple Living!

This is the first air fryer I’ve owned. I bought this particular brand because many of the people I follow on Instagram swear by it (bloggers, foodies), the reviews on Amazon are great and the price was right! I’ve only used it once but it’s very easy to use. I made arancini and they came out perfectly! Very crispy on the outside and moist inside. And only 6 minutes in the air fryer. No oil, no mess, and healthy!! I’m very pleased so far. Feel free to check out my Instagram account @jens_healthy_balanced_life for air fryer recipe ideas. I’ve only made the arincini but plan on using this fantastic appliance again and again. Happy air frying!!

I'm still learning how to convert regular cooking times to Air Fryer cooking times, but everything that I've fixed with it has turned out great! We are empty nesters now and I love the quick cooking times without having to use oil to fry things. I have gotten away from frying, so this is great! Also, love the cleanup! It's so easy to clean, unlike what I had expected. I would definitely recommend to a friend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product, easy to use, crisp food..this is a good one
reviews.reviewText:
There are a lot of options out there for these types of products, so it took a while to get through the reviews to help us decide. This was easy to setup and my wife was air frying 20 minutes later. We have only stuck to the basics so far (tater tots, fries, etc) and they come out very crisp and tasty! It is very easy to operate and clean up is easy as well.

The size we purchased is good for 2-3 people for serving sizes. So it is perfect for us.

reviews.reviewTitle: I think that this was the best price for the size, and wattage.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a gift for a family of 7. It serves them well, and allows them to prepare messy things like bacon, without a lot of clean up. It’s perfect when you are making other things in the oven, and you want to make something else, that requires a different temperature. It does not put out a lot of heat, and as big as it is...it fits perfectly on the counter , beneath the dish cabinets.

reviews.reviewTitle: Who doesn't like air fried food
reviews.reviewText: Who doesn't like air fried food?! This is the 2nd air fryer I have purchased. The first one I purchased from another maker chipped and cracked pretty easy. When I returned the previous one and decided I needed a larger one (because I love air fried food!) I decided on this one. It is perfect. It is large capacity, comes with a few extra air fryer gadgets...who doesn't like extra cookware! It includes 3 additional pieces, 2 pans,and grill rack. Definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewTitle: This product is even better than I had expected
reviews.reviewText: Wow! This product is even better than I had expected. Easy to use and easy to clean. Still experimenting with new and all kinds of recipes. It is big and requires a bit of counter space, but not as bad as I thought. It holds quite a bit and cooks things quickly, At first I was uncomfortable with the idea of shaking the basket, but it is no big deal. In fact it is not a problem to open the basket and check progress...just like looking in the oven! I also bought one for my sister-in-law and she loves hers too!

The Simple Living 5.8qt Digital XL Air Fryer has been an instant hit in our home. We use it on average 8-10 times per week. Chicken wings get a nice crunch without oil at 370 degrees. Chops and even steaks have turned out moist and juicy.
We also use the airfryer for heating up frozen snacks, fries, nuggets etc. Everyone in the house uses it. It is definitely a go-to item in the kitchen. The size is ideal for a bigger meal prep. It can cook a medium sized whole chicken. The extra accessor smaller pan works well for burgers.
We had an issue with our unit and customer service resolved it right away.
Good purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: A busy moms favorite small appliance!
reviews.reviewText: By far my favorite small appliance! I had an airfryer before this and it was loud and hard to close the handle. This airfryer has multiple uses, is extremely quiet, easy to clean, and we use it every day! So easy to make your own frys, chicken nuggets, cake you name it. I’m a busy mom and this makes my life so much easier! You won’t be disappointed!

First off I NEVER write reviews and I buy stuff from Amazon monthly. My UPS guy is my best friend. lol
Simple Living is the Best company I have dealt with in a long time. We live in a day and age where no one cares about anything but themselves. I bought the air fryer one day and the next day when putting it away the basket slide out and broke into a few pieces. I was pisses (at myself)!! I sent a message to Simple Living about what happened and I figured it would take a few days and they would tell me that it was my fault and tell me I had to buy a whole new basket or even unit. But instead a wonderful women named Michelle reached out to me (less than 24hrs) and worked with me to get the parts I needed to fix the machine. Its great to work with a company that is based here in the US. If I ever buy and products again and Simple living makes it they will be my clear choice. Oh and BTW this Air Fryer rocks!

reviews.reviewTitle: I had a small problem with my machine and as ...
reviews.reviewText: I had a small problem with my machine and as I use it every day I thought I would just be out of a machine and possibly have to buy an other one. But I contacted Simple Living Products on Saturday and heard right back from them asking for the details and sent them what they wanted. On Monday, today, I have a tracking number for the replacement machine. I haven't had such immediate response in my life. Very very satisfactory https://www.amazon.com/dp/B06XQHCTL8/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_0

Love this air fryer. Bought one for the mother in law and then another for us.

Easy to use and has a very large basket. So far, no problems with the basket coating, but just need to make sure to clean gently. Due to the big basket, the footprint is also large ... Make sure you have space.

This fryer may cost more than the lower cost options, but worth it.

Very satisfied with this item. We had bought the air fryer oven but all the food smelled and tasted like hot plastic every time we used it. This fryer works and the food has no resemblance of plastic.

This air fryer works very well. We have been pleased how easy it is, and the good everything comes out. We use it almost every day. Getting the large 5.2L basket was well worth it.

We had only one issue. After about 4 months, the heating coil went out. However I contacted Simple Living, and they were very pleasant to deal with, and within a couple of days had a new unit shipped to us at no charge. They apologized for the issue, and explained they have less than a 1% defective rate.

I was very satisfied with the resolution they provided, and believe they are a very reliable company. I would have no problem buying another Simple Living product.

reviews.reviewTitle: This was one of my best decisions! Its has so much room
reviews.reviewText:
This was one of my best decisions! Its has so much room! Everything I cook comes out great! My husband is a picky eater it makes my life easier!
**UPDATE: IT STOPPED WORKING!

We used this cooker the day we received. We made the zucchini fries which surprisingly were pretty darn good. We cooked our perch and smelt in our regular deep fryer. Next time now we know how to use the air cooker and how easy it is to use we will be frying up the fish as well. I would like to try some chicken in it as well as French fried potatoes. Given some time I see using the air fry more and more once we get comfortable using it. Overall I would give this an A+ rating. Just have to learn how to use it properly.

reviews.reviewTitle: I couldn't be more satisfied with this product and with Michelle in Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: This item works as advertised! It can do more than I have done to this point! I dropped the bottom tray and needed to get it replaced, Michelle in customer service was extremely helpful in getting a replacement part! I couldn't be more satisfied with this product and with Michelle in Customer Service!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Temperature regulator stopped working, go elsewhere
reviews.reviewText:
Waste of money... worked great for 1 year and the temperature got “ stuck” at 200 degrees (won’t go up beyond that. No customer service, no, number you have to e-mail and get your e-mail answered after a few weeks. They e-mailed saying to send them s video which I did and dead silence.
Just save yourselves the headache and go with another brand...

I bought this based on reviews and glad I did. I wanted a large enough fryer to not have to do lots of small batches. Easy to use and super easy to clean up. No preheat required. Also liked that it came with some accessories. Will try using them next

I love this air fryer! This is the first one I’ve owned so I can’t compare it to others, but it’s been very easy to use and clean and has made delicious meals. So far we’ve made fish tacos and chicken parm using the air fryer. Everything came out crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside! I can’t wait to keep trying out recipes. My kids want to try and make donuts next 🙂

reviews.reviewTitle: this is a pretty big basket on here
reviews.reviewText: Have only used a handful of times now but I am liking it very much. I returned a smaller one since it was just too small to even lay a piece of fish in. this is a pretty big basket on here!! Others stated it wasn't much bigger in size outside than the smaller ones ...but then I was kinda surprised how big it was when it arrived!! Learning curve still working on it but very happy with the product so far!

I love this product. It is so easy to use and clean. I can cook so many things in this machine that I did not realize until we got it home. I use it almost every day. It makes french fries and other "fried" foods with little to no oil that taste exactly like a restaurant. I personally use spray olive oil when I do feel that I need a little oil to keep a food from drying out. Things cook in half the time that they would take in the oven, without heating up the oven and heating up my house. We have also cooked pork chops and chicken wings to perfection in this air fryer. Baked potatoes come out with crispy outsides and fluffy insides. The basket is large and is plenty for our family of four. We also purchased the divider to go into the basket so we could split it in half and cook two different foods when we need to. Definitely recommend this product if you don't like to spend your whole night in the kitchen.

I loved this when I first received it, but on the 3rd or 4th time I used it, I went outside on the patio after cooking our meal , my husband and I keep hearing a popping noise, I went back inside and it had caught on fire.

LOVE my air fryer! Super convenient, heats up quick, big basket to cook for 2! I’ve made meat loaf, sweet potato fries, bloomin onion, chicken, all sorts of veggies, onion rings! Reheats leftovers better than anything. Frozen foods from the freezer come out evenly cooked and golden crispy! You can open it mid-cook to shake the basket or turn items and it resumes cook temp and time no problem. We had a rare issue with the power not coming on after 8 months and the company was so easy to work with- sent us a new unit (under 1 year warranty) super quick! My only problem is it doesn’t fit in any of my kitchen cabinets- that’s my only complaint! Lots of great cookbooks on the market with great, healthy airfryer recipes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product but the Teflon flakes
reviews.reviewText: Love it and healthy. Cooking whole turkey breasts. Bought it last August but now the coating is flaking off. Make sure you read the manual if you use a sponge with the light green scrubber on it to remove cooked on food it removes all the Teflon and they won't replace it. 70$ to replace basket and tub. They say it voids the warranty.

My partner and I have been on the Keto diet for a few weeks and have avoided fried foods all together. After finding recipes that called for an air fryer I decided to purchase this one. The first night we had it we made fried chicken tenders using crunch pork rinds as the breading. It tastes better than the real thing using this air fryer - and the best part is that you don’t feel guilty while eating.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, fast clean-up, fast cooking and doesn’t heat up the kitchen in hot weather..
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only used my fryer once so far but was very impressed. I cooked marinated chicken breast and they came out so tender and juicy. I can’t wait to use it again. My sister has one and she swears by it. She uses it almost every day and says she wouldn’t live without it. She wore one out and bought another! lol

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great machine, but be advised it’s very large and ...
reviews.reviewText: This is a great machine, but be advised it’s very large and the basket is kind of cumbersome. However, we use it frequently, and it does a nice job. Things like french fries need to be shaken to get everything cooked evenly. We’re pleased though, and if you have a large family, this can do a whole bag of frozen fries or chicken nuggets without a problem.

Love the way it cooks, the size & how quiet it is. Non stick surface is already peeling off after 3 months of use.
Bought extended warranty but only covers “working parts”. Go figure 😩

reviews.reviewTitle: Where has this been all my life!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! I received my air fryer last week. I have cooked at least five different recipes that I pulled from cooking blogs and the Cooks Illustrated air fryer recipe book (kindle). The devise operated exactly as advertised and cleans up in a snap. I was reluctant to buy an air fryer because all of the dryers I had seen seemed small. I didn’t want to always be cooking in batches. This product is the perfect size for a 3 person family. No multiple batches! Great product-I sold my oil fryer.

What a great air fryer. We use it all the time. We have cooked turkey breasts in it, whole chicken fryers baked potatoes and so much more. Works great. It's a nice size and much more useful and versatile than a lot of them I have seen which are smaller.

I love this product! I have made chicken, vegetables and other dishes. Low fat and easy to use. Many recipes are available online. I suggest getting an oil mister to go with this air fryer- good for lightly spraying your food.

This thing cooks food fast and taste better than from a microwave. We've been using it everyday since we got it. The outer pan is a little difficult to clean with the food sticking to it, but a little scrubbing takes care of it.

The fryer was easy to easy. My 16 year old has been experimenting with different foods and since it does not involve oil, I feel safe with him using when I am not home. The food come a out crispy and even though we cook the food longer than what the guide book says, it is still faster than warming up the oven.

I use this for everything! I made corn on the cob, french fries (of course), used it to reheat restaurant pizza- comes out so great, cooked filet mignon perfectly!, Made my own fried chicken, Chicken quesadillas last night, cooks frozen breakfast sausage perfectly, bacon, italian sausage in half the time...It's endless! I have recommended this fryer to so many people and I plan on giving one to my friend as a wedding gift! It has replaced the slow cooker, microwave, oven, stove-top and pressure cooker! so perfect for my busy family of 6 to eat homemade meals and reduce trips for fast foods because of lack of time! wonderful product!

I love my new air fryer. We use it for everything. The fryer itself is so easy to use. Whatever we cook comes out moist and juicy. No more dry chicken or pork chops. Even veggies are a cinch.
My boyfriend uses it more than me. He loves his tater tots in the air fryer. No more greasy fish and chips either.
Love the baking pan as well. Made some lowfat pumpkin cake. Yummy.
Also, I should mention that their customer service is top notch as well. Thank you Michelle!!
I will always be a customer of Simple Living Products.

We love using this for vegetables. It is so much faster than using the oven. It is really easy to clean and use. There are many recipes on the Internet. I thought foods would come out crispier than the oven but I can’t seem to make that happen short of burning them. The food is still flavorful and the lack of crispy good is likely user error!

This is a great air fryer for the money. Leading brands this size cost twice as much. The handle does get hot enough to require a mitt. The drawer must be slid in at a precise angle, which would not be good for those with dexterity limitations. It needs more accessories, especially a grill pan, but those that come with it are nice. It seems to cook evenly so far and has PLENTY of room.
This air fryer does everything that it says it can do. No regrets in buying it. Very fast delivery, too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Air frying is a simple and healthy way to approach meals.
reviews.reviewText: The Simple Living Air Fryer is both easy to use and easy to clean which is very important. You can prepare quick and easy meals or snacks with little mess to clean up. It comes with a small cookbook (there are many recipes online as well) , pizza pan , cake pan and rack. The only negative aspect of this purchase is that they are 71/4" in diameter instead of 8" which doesn't sound like much but gives you much more space for the items you cook. I have purchased an additional 8" air fryer rack to compensate. Overall this is an outstanding addition to your kitchen and this product is top rate.

I have had my air fryer for about 7 months now & I love it! It is fast & easy to use. I have made a small pork roast & potatoes, French fries, chicken breasts, spare ribs, fried potatoes, Hamburg’s, hotdogs. It’s great in the summer because you don’t heat the whole kitchen. It’s also fast to clean. My family has also bought this air fryer & love it!

I ordered this and we began to use it the day we opened it. WE LOVE IT!! We cook everything in it and it works perfectly. A few months in, we had a small issue with the burner. I emailed customer service and they quickly took care of the problem. They not only sent a new part but followed up with me every step of the way to make sure I was informed on tracking and when I received it,, they made sure it was up and running again. I can't say enough good things about Simple Living. They did a great job for me...

I've changed my rating to 5 stars again. I love this air fryer. It is so easy to use and to clean. Cooks wonderfully without all that grease. Their customer service is great too! When mine stopped working Michelle responded to my email very quickly. When it was determined they couldn't fix it they sent me a new one. No cost to me. Can't beat that, and Michelle is so nice to deal with.

We absolutely LOVE our Simple Living airfryer! We used it almost everyday & sometimes more than once!! It's fast, easy & easy to clean. I just wish someone would make some offset utensils to turn food in them without tongs, I burned myself once trying to turn food. Get yourself some cookbooks and/or recipes online
Love it, love it, LOVE IT!!!
The first thing I cooked was breaded pork chops. they were the best pork chops I ever made. Easy and quick.
The size is great. It's just wonderful to cook with. Crispy tater tots, amazing steak and chicken. Never thought I would use this daily but I do!

reviews.reviewTitle: Still Learning and looking for healthy recipes
reviews.reviewText:
Two things I tried = one was not cooked through and the other was great.
Still learning how to use and would like more access to healthy recipes.
The cookbook with the airfryer is pretty useless.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very easy to use and clean after
reviews.reviewText:
Very easy to use and clean after. Food comes out crispy. We tried to re heat breaded zucchini and they also came out crispy (and not soggy at all!).
Made fries and they also come out crispy!
The only thing I didn't realize that the dryer is pretty big and bulky. However, for how easy it is to use and how well cooks, I don't mind the size.
The best part is no wait to pre heat, you just punt the food in and go! Breaded chicken breast done in 18 min!

Very easy to use with amazing results. I am getting my kitchen remodeled and needed a means to cook for my family. I have cooked chicken , lamb and tasty steaks. The size is optimal for small family and I like that I can open to check on food and resume cooking by simply closing. This was helpful because some foods are trial and error when it comes to length of cooking. I made a squash zucchini and carrots veggie medley that turned out great!

Awesome cooking device, i use this almost everyday. This is my go to for my cooking needs, when not having a full kitchen. i even cook in my room and food smell is not that present at all, depending on what ur cooking, Glad i pull the trigger on this, when there are so many air fryers out there

Love it!!! Clean up is quick and cooking time is awesome. I worried about using it but o certain I did I won feared why I waited so long!! I made cauliflower fries and pork chops. For the first time at home,my fries were crispy on the outside while tender pantheon side. Chops were tasty and moist.

Can't wait to fry more things in it!!

9 Months of use and this appliance has become the best in the kitchen — 5 stars. Customer service issue at the nine-month mark and the company surpassed all expectations, 5 Star. This air fryer made it possible to throw out my deep fryer and use my oven half as much. The quality is by far better than the stove. The biggest reason I wrote this review is because of the customer service provided when I had an issue. This company was Professional, Reactive and Extraordinary in their customer service. I highly recommend any purchase from this company.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sad that it’s already flaking off
reviews.reviewText: For size and consistent results, I would give this 5 stars. The reason it gets 4 is after less than 2 months of usage, the basket is chipping. We followed the manual on how to use it and it is hand washed and dried. Sad that it’s already flaking off...

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome, easy to use, super healthy, easy clean
reviews.reviewText:
Easy to use
Easy to clean
Tried it with breaded fish and tots for the first time
Came out perfect no more mess in kitchen!
No oil to clean up I just sprayed a little on the food.

Was a gift to daughter and she loves it —she did fried chicken and different vegetables and really turned out nice—she did get the liners to help with cleaning and she says just basically wipe out when done

Gave this as a Christmas gift to my daughter-in-law. This is her first air fryer. Well....I have to tell you this is amazing!!!! Everything she has made in it has come out juicy and delicious. She absolutely loves this. Easy to use and clean. Highly recommend this.

This was purchased as a Christmas gift for one of my children. Since it’s not Christmas yet, I can’t rate it. I selected this particular air fryer because it seemed to be just what my family needs. Great capacity, easy to use and, hopefully easy to clean. The price was right too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Got this a few weeks ago. Have made chicken ...
reviews.reviewText:
Got this a few weeks ago. Have made chicken, sausage, mozzarella sticks and fish (for fish sandwich). Still getting used to how to cook different foods. That is, what temperature to use, how long, etc

Will have to give a more complete review down the road.
Used this fryer mainly for appetizers. Works quick and great. Frees up the oven for other food. Great for cheese sticks and buffalo wings.

My husband and I have tried it twice and it didn't do very well but it may just be us not understanding how to use it properly. He tried some fried fish first and it didn't brown properly. He was so eager to try it that he may have done it wrong. The recipe book doesn't give good directions on how to fry fish, chicken or bacon. It just gives the tempature and time to cook it. I would like recipes too instead if time and temp.

I LOVE this air fryer!!! It is so easy to use and is wonderful for making all kinds of foods, healthy too!! I've been using it everyday! It is large enough for a family of 4 and is wonderful! If you're on the fence about getting on, do yourself a favor and BUY IT!! You wont be disappointed!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works, but cheaply made. Worthless pre-sets!
reviews.reviewText:
The outer plastic shell of this small appliance is made of very cheap black plastic. Even though it was held suspended by packaging material, the black plastic is really scuffed up--right out of the box. Don't expect it to come all nice and shiny as shown in the pictures.

I looked at the Simple Living website before I bought this during this summer's Prime Day (and a half), and it gave the appearance of conscientiousness, so I had higher hopes for better quality than I see here--this product sitting on my counter top. Be aware that this is not the quality of a name brand. This will never be a name brand.

But the machine works. It's not exactly quiet, but it holds heat and odors inside. There is no way to gauge how much air circulates around inside, as I don't have anything to compare it to. But I have found that I've been getting my best results from just one setting: High--400 degrees Fahrenheit. I just vary the cooking time.

I do not like that--once I program the machine--it starts up with some other heat and time settings. Then it shuts off and I start again. I can't figure it out....Am I doing something wrong? Or is it the machine? I have only used the manual settings and have not bothered with pre-set temps/times. The pre-sets, (fries, ribs, shrimp, cake, poultry, steak, fish) seem ridiculous to me, as amounts and thicknesses will be so variable that what works one time, for one cook, will be very different the next time, or for another cook. Worthless pre-sets!

And my machine does not beep, (as the instructions claim), when the cooking is complete.

Opening the basket door, sliding out, sliding back in, is a sensitive procedure that requires TLC and a very precise angle to get it just right.

Clean up is not hard--if you are not a messy person. There are way too many ins and outs on the fryer pan, (exposed parts between the inside surface and the outside plastic), to make cleaning easy--even though you can put this in the dishwasher. And if you do put the pieces in the dishwasher, they take up a quarter of the space.

Do not underestimate the size of this appliance. It is very large sitting on your counter top or center island. It is too large to fit in any of my cabinets.

Hey, just a FYI if you do buy this air fryer. Actually good advice for any air fryer purchase: Buy a quality oil sprayer (hand pump bottle, not a fine mister), because you are going to be spraying the foods with a coating of oil if you want crispness. And have a small amount of coconut oil on hand for priming the very cheap non-stick surface in the pan and basket. For some reason that I do not completely understand, coconut oil has the best molecular make-up for priming. Oh, also beware that "non-stick" on this air fryer (and a lot of other air fryers), is hardly non-stick.
Great product

Did a ton of research — and even tried another brand of air fryer — before deciding on this unit and couldn’t be happier. The quality of the unit is excellent and the size (although difficult when it comes to finding a place to store it) helps avoid having to cook in small batches. We use it all the time — the taste of our food is outstanding and especially love how it dramatically cuts down on cooking time! Customer service is excellent, as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product, but with a learning curve.
reviews.reviewText: The air fryer arrived as advertised. However, it also came with a divider and a wire rack for which there were no directions. I've used it twice, which is enough to tell me that there is a learning curve with this product. French fries came out very tasty, although I found that it took longer than suggested. I think I probably put too many fries in there at a time, and didn't shake them enough while cooking. But that was easily resolved by putting them back in for another 10 minutes and stirring them around a little better. I also cooked assorted chicken parts, for which no one seems to provide a recipe. I guessed at 30 minutes at 400 degrees. They came out very juicy and tasty (I pulled off the skin before cooking and dusted them with Shake And Bake for flavor), but some pieces were still a bit raw in the middle. Next time, I'm going to cook longer and at a lower temperature, and rearrange them part way to make for more even cooking. Also, it advertises a "recipe book" that is supposed to come with the fryer. I don't think I'd call a seven-recipe pamphlet a "recipe book." Fortunately, I bought a 130-recipe book with the fryer. Looking forward to experimenting a bit more.
